mapper.sql: id, materialNames, dosage, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE cm_cook_material
materialNames = #{map.materialNames},
dosage = #{map.dosage},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cm_cook_material
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND materialNames like CONCAT('%', #{materialNames} , '%')
AND dosage like CONCAT('%', #{dosage} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
